handshake_exception: Data Parsing Error, We couldn't process the data from the server. Please try again later.
unprocessable_response: Unexpected Server Response, We're experiencing technical difficulties with our server. Please try again later.
timed_out_or_no_internet: Connection Timed Out, It appears there is an issue with your internet connection or the server is unreachable. Please check your internet connection and try again.
bad_request_exception: Sorry for the inconvenience, We've encountered a bad request error. Please retry again.
unauthorized_exception: Unauthorized Access, You do not have permissions to access this resource. Please ensure you are authenticated and authorized to access this content.
forbidden_exception: Access Forbidden, You do not have permission to access the resource. Please ensure you are authorized to view or modify this content.
request_not_found_exception: Resource Not Found, The requested resource could not be found. Please verify the URL and try again.
method_not_allowed_exception: Method Not Allowed, The requested method is not supported for this resource.
conflict_in_request_exception: Request could not be processed because of conflict in the request, Please try again.
server_error_exception: Internal Server Error, Please try a few minutes later.
service_unavailable_exceeption: The server is currently unable to handle the request due to temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.
unknown_error_exception: Unknown Error, Something unexpected happened. Please try again later or contact support for assistance.
